long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can quickly paste any type of text to the website https://pastebin.com. The extension installs a small icon in your browser. When you highlight any text in Google Chrome and press the 'Pastebin' button, it will automatically paste the selected text into the textarea. When you press submit you will be presented with a unique URL where you can find your pasted text. You can customize the extension via the Options panel.
